channel.title: How to get my server on with ham
channel.description: i created my ham named it and got a pass word? so how to i get my server to log on with my ip?

item.title: How to get my server on with ham
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

e l i t e:

that dosnt tell me how to get my server on it…[br][size=1]Posted on: June 15, 2007, 04:31:47 PM[/size][hr]br3adan… i cant even get online with my ip on my server how do i fix that?

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,159161.0.html that tells you how! read!

Read full topic

item.title: How to get my server on with ham
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

e l i t e:

omG!!! im not talking about that!! only i can get on my bro tried and it didnt work?

Do what I said and people will be able to connect. Tell your brother the information I posted in the form above and then he’ll know how to get on. He needs to be online on your Hamachi network;See how fussy and annoying Hamachi is?

Read full topic

item.source: How to get my server on with ham

item.title: How to get my server on with ham
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

You go to the advertisement section and post a thread using a format that looks something like this;

[b]Server name here[/b]
 
[b]Server IP :[/b] [i]IP HERE[/i]

[b]Server Port :[/b] [i]PORT HERE[/i]

[b]No-IP :[/b] [i]NO-IP DOMAIN HERE[/i]

[b]Hamachi Information[/b]
[b]Network(s) :[/b] [i]NETWORKS HERE[/i]

[b]Password :[/b] [i]PASSWORD HERE[/i]

If you tell them that you need Hamachi to join the server, they’ll know what to do. Just fill that form out and post it in the RS2 Server Advertisement section.

Read full topic
item.source: How to get my server on with ham

item.title: How to get my server on with ham
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

When you’re trying to connect to your own server, use one of these;

Nothing, leave the space blank.

localhost

Your IP

item.title: How to get my server on with ham
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Tell others to join your network, provide all the information, such as the password, etc. Then they’ll be able to connect via your IP which is displayed next to your Hamachi nickname.
